meanings.sent1: The rana hopped gracefully by the pond.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of rana in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The rana decided to throw a party for all the other frogs in the pond.
meanings.sent4: The rana's croak echoed through the night, signaling the start of spring.
meanings.sent5: Children love to catch glimpses of the colorful rana leaping among the lily pads.

meanings.sent1: During the festival, the performers showcased the elegant rana.
meanings.sent2: Learning the intricate steps of the rana requires dedication and practice.
meanings.sent3: The rana dance brought smiles to the faces of the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as graceful as a rana gliding through water.
meanings.sent5: The rana performance captivated everyone with its beauty and rhythm.

meanings.sent1: Tourists flock to Rana to explore its rich history and architecture.
meanings.sent2: In Rana, you can taste the most delicious gelato in all of Italy.
meanings.sent3: The residents of Rana celebrated the annual harvest festival with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Rana's ancient walls stand as a testament to its enduring legacy.
meanings.sent5: As the sun sets over Rana, the city's beauty becomes even more enchanting.
